post.text: Hillary and Al Gore are live from Miami speaking about why we have to act on climate change. Watch live:

comment.author: Warren
comment.text: Hillary has been such an inspiration to me and now even more so to my teenage daughters...they know they can grow up to be president!

replies.author: Ruth
replies.text: Lol... How much of an inspiration is she going to be when the terrorists rape them??? She is for SHARIA LAW... WAKE UP!!!

replies.author: Zane
replies.text: Ruth wow. What channel are you watching?
